items.title: Kirloskar firms challenge SEBI letter asking disclosure of family settlement deed at SAT
items.description: Kirloskar siblings, with Sanjay (Kirloskar Brothers Ltd Chairman and Managing Director) on one side and Atul and Rahul on the other, have been in a feud since 2016 over the DFS for the assets of the more than 130-year-old Kirloskar group.
